title: Can't verify face. Try again. Pixel 4XL
content:
Hi there,

I have a big issue with my Pixel 4 XL face unlock.

Every time I try to unlock my phone with my face I get this error "Can't verify face. Try again"

I just updated it to the latest Security Patch and it didn't fix anything.

I also tried factory reset but no success.

Any recommendation on how to fix this?
